content.body: Hm, yeah, I guess the job requirements pretty much rule anything other than an event loop
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hm, yeah, I guess the job requirements pretty much rule anything other than an event loop

content.body: Sure but still some people in TC39 spaces will not like to hear those words… so it is fine to have as a mental model but not how proposal spec text should be written.
The module map is a similar situation—the idempotency requirement on imports necessitates it exist at some level, but it is defined outside of Ecma-262.
